quest.name: Reaching Out
journal: Mikoto is ready to send you back out into the field.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A Resistance rank of [#1] is required to proceed with this quest.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: The Resistance is preparing to secure a new outpost. After an analysis of the area, however, I regret to say there is nowhere near enough residual aether to power the barrier.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: To make matters worse, its rather awkward location requires us to redirect multiple currents to sustain a sufficient flow of energy.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: That's where these beauties come in─the defluxion aether manipulators, Mark II and Mark III! What sets them apart from the first model, you may ask...? Well, apart from the name, not a lot, but they are newer, if that counts for anything!

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Though we both wish we could go with you, I fear we would only slow you down. Please, be safe out there.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)You have reached the designated location, yes? Readying transmission protocols.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)So far, so good. Has the D.A.M. burrowed into the ground?

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)Excellent. Proceed to the next site, and stay vigilant─there is no telling when you may encounter imperial forces.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)Excellent. Return to the outpost and we shall handle the rest.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)Imperials? They didn't get the better of you, did they? No... I suppose you wouldn't be contacting me if they did. <sigh> I really must learn not to jump to conclusions... Ahem.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)The D.A.M. appears to be fully operational. How are things there?

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)Excellent. Proceed to the next site, and stay vigilant─there is no telling when you may encounter imperial forces.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: (-Mikoto-)Excellent. Return to the outpost and we shall handle the rest.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Welcome back. Our sensors detect steady streams of aether flowing toward the site of the new outpost.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Now it is up to the Resistance to drive away the imperials. Once they have, a substantial confluence of energy should be available to power a new barrier.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: Well, everything seems to be under control here, so I'd better get going.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: Oh, right. Mikoto's gathered some promising data to help the chief deal with the Dalriada.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: It pertains to my findings on the inner workings of the crystal foci. I believe it may be of use to him.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: The chief said he'd be heading back to Doma after finishing maintenance on Seiryu's Wall. Rather than drag him all the way back here, it seems quicker if I take the data to him myself. But don't worry─I'll be back before you know it.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: Ah, before I go... Mikoto. Is there anything else you'd like me to pass on to Cid?

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: It's not good to keep your emotions bottled up like that, you know. Why don't you tell him how you feel?

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text:
How I f─ <gasp> Lilja! That is wholly and utterly unprofessional! I-I would never... He would never! And even if we did, we...
This is neither the time nor the place to discuss such matters!

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: I think it is. I've seen far too many people live to regret words left unspoken.

dialogue.name: LILJA
dialogue.text: Just think on it, will you? And try not to miss me while I'm away!

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Um... Is there any chance you could forget that entire conversation?

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: I was only joking, but thank you for trying!

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: To tell the truth, since entering the Studium, my life has had but one singular purpose─the pursuit of knowledge. Yet for all my research and scholarly works, I never learned what it truly means to live.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: At least, that is what Moenbryda would tell me. She would often admonish me, always insisting I spend time with the other students, or at the very least step away from my dusty tomes for some fresh air.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Perhaps she hoped I might find someone I cherished more than my books, though sadly she never had the chance to see it.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Cid is truly a remarkable man, and I'll not deny our shared interest in the sciences. During the short time we've worked together, we've become good friends.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: And as his friend, I understand the great burdens of his mind. Even now, he struggles to break free from his ties to the Empire and his father's terrible legacy...

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: Which is why I wish to do all within my power to support him. As a friend, mind you. My feelings toward Cid are similar to those I felt for Moenbryda─respect and admiration.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: As much as I hate to disappoint Lilja, that is the way of things. So please, don't read too deeply into it.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: M-Master Gerolt! What are you doing here?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Better question'd be what are you doin' here? Should be you payin' the visit to Cid in Doma.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Nothin' to be embarrassed about, lass. All romances have to start somewhere, and I agree the two o' ye make a good match.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But you need to act quick. Even I can see the man's a fine glass of ale, and I reckon it won't be long afore some pretty thing snatches him up to take a swig.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: Well? Is it ready?

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: The modifications will require more time.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: You can't be serious! It's been ages since the damn thing was excavated. Have the engineers been sitting around with their thumbs up their arses all this time!?

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: Far from it. Given that this is unexplored territory, we must proceed with caution.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: Tell that to the Resistance soldiers a stone's throw from our bloody front door. It won't be long before they tear it down.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: Why not withdraw to Dalmasca? Surely they can finish their modifications on the way back?

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: Withdraw? You would abandon everything we have labored for here in Bozja? And that is not all we stand to lose... Surely, you have not forgotten the events of Castrum Meridianum?

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: I only know what I've heard, that Gaius's pet ended up biting the hand that fed it before turning the place upside down.

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: Not quite the wording used in the reports, but accurate enough... Knowing his plans would soon be thwarted, he deployed an anti-eikon warmachina in a final attempt to drive back the Eorzean forces. He could not contain its power, and because of his hubris, the castrum was wiped off the map.

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: In short, the relics of the Allagans are not to be trifled with. It takes but one mistake for our plans to fall to ruin.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: And yet Sicinius has seen fit to scurry off to some far-flung hole when he's needed most. This was his scheme, not ours. He should be the one overseeing all this.

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: ...Perhaps you should put this pent-up frustration of yours to use outside. After all, in light of Misija's recent failure, it now falls to us to rout the Resistance.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: Really? You're asking me to go out there? Hah, it's about damn time!

dialogue.name: MENENIUS
dialogue.text: Hmph. Somehow I knew you would relish the opportunity to get your hands dirty.

dialogue.name: RIAN
dialogue.text: Oh, I assure you they'll be absolutely filthy by the time I return.

dialogue.name: MIKOTO
dialogue.text: It seems the Resistance already has their sights set on another potential outpost site. I can only hope they secure the location without heavy losses.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next quest can be accepted by speaking with Dmitar after reaching Resistance rank [#1] or higher.
